Deploy ThingsBoard PE Maker

Deploy using AWS marketplace. With up to 10 devices, this pricing model is ideal for makers that are getting started with ThingsBoard PE.

$0.014/hr or $100/year (18% savings) for software + AWS usage fees
($10/month calculated based on ~720 usage hours)

Please fill this form to get deployment instructions.

Deploy ThingsBoard PE Prototype

Deploy using AWS marketplace. With up to 100 devices and white-labeling feature enabled, this pricing model is ideal for PoCs and to be used as an ultimate selling tool for your solution.

$0.138/hr or $1000/year (17% savings) for software + AWS usage fees
($99/month calculated based on ~720 usage hours)

Please fill this form to get deployment instructions.

Deploy ThingsBoard PE Startup

Deploy using AWS marketplace. With up to 500 devices and white-labeling feature enabled, this pricing model is ideal for startups and field trials.

$0.277/hr or $2000/year (18% savings) for software + AWS usage fees
($199/month calculated based on ~720 usage hours)

Please fill this form to get deployment instructions.

Deploy ThingsBoard PE Business

Deploy using AWS marketplace. With up to 1000 devices and white-labeling feature enabled, this pricing model is ideal for small businesses and solutions.

$0.416/hr or $3000/year (18% savings) for software + AWS usage fees
($299/month calculated based on ~720 usage hours)

Please fill this form to get deployment instructions.

Deploy ThingsBoard PE Enterprise

Deploy using AWS marketplace. This pricing model is ideal for businesses with large number of devices. No limits per device, message, data points or commands triggered.

$0.694/hr or $5000/year (18% savings) for software + AWS usage fees
($500/month calculated based on ~720 usage hours)

Please fill this form to get deployment instructions.
